name: Flourish (snowdrift)
description:
Flourish is a game where you make a garden.  The game is set in a greenhouse with some peaceful lofi music playing in the background, but don't let that fool you.  The plants need to be looked after or they can and will die!

You win when you have tried to grow a plant in all pots and any that aren't dead are healthy and flowering.

You lose if all plants die.

Pick up objects with left mouse button, pour water and nutrients with right mouse button.

Plants will wilt when either either watered too much or too little.

Plants will darken when given too much or too little nutrients.

It's up to you to pay attention and judge how much you gave each plant.

It's up to you to choose your difficulty.  The more plants you try to grow at once, they more difficult the game is.

Every object in the game is interactable and you can organize and place objects in your greenhouse however you like.

Enjoy!

Game code and Unity project is available on Github: https://github.com/brianpmaher/Flourish
